hero.educationJourney: Your Education Journey to Knowledge Begins Here

faq.subtitle: We got you
faq.description: More than 120 people asked many questions, we reply as soon as possible.

questions.0: What fields of courses are available on the platform?
questions.1: How can I benefit from embedded exercises in the video?
questions.2: Are there certificates after completing courses?
questions.3: How can I search for a specific course?

answers.0: The platform offers courses in various fields such as programming, design, digital marketing, personal development, and more. You can browse and benefit from all courses for free.
answers.1: While watching lessons, interactive exercises will appear to help you test your understanding of the content instantly.
answers.2: Since the platform is free, certificates are not currently available. However, you can gain practical skills and benefit from exercises to enhance your expertise.
answers.3: You can use the search feature within the website to find courses by field or course title.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.welcomeMessage: Welcome to our free online education platform
aboutUs.description: We are here to provide you with a unique and accessible learning experience. Our mission is to empower learners of all ages to access the knowledge and skills they need to achieve their aspirations. Our platform offers a diverse range of courses covering various fields, with content created by experts in each discipline. We believe that education is a right for everyone, and we strive to create an inclusive and supportive learning environment.

testimonial.title: Testimonial
testimonial.question: What did our Students say About us?
testimonial.description: Our students love the platform, they appreciate the engaging content and the flexibility it offers for learning at their own pace.

testimonialSwiper.quote: This platform has made learning so much easier and enjoyable. The interactive lessons keep me engaged, and I love the flexibility it offers.
testimonialSwiper.name: Mohammad Bohlak
